column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is my favorite restaurant in Chicago
column2: hands down.  Since moving here in July 2018
column3: I think I've been 8+ times.  I've brought visitors from out-of-town
column5: and dragged big groups of friends to Cafe Ba Ba Reeba! It works for seriously any occasion
column6: and the food and drinks are delicious (and reasonably priced for a satisfying dinner and cool atmosphere).
